item.description:
It's a beautiful day, and what better way to celebrate than to eat lunch outside on the New Haven Green!

Join me and Ben on one of the marble benches surrounding the flagpole and fountain on the Green at 12:15 today! I'll be getting a veggie burrito at the York St/Broadway cart. I think Ben has pb&j.

If you live/work downtown, or are in the area, come out, bring a frisbee or kite or blanket, and join us!

Eric is your contact: my number will be in my rsvp :)
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing a red polo shirt and sunglasses
item.name: Lunch on the New Haven Green 12:15p
